originalText.text: Meni helped us pick out and installed solar shades for several rooms in our home--including a solar/blackout combination in our bedroom. They look fantastic. He also expedited shipping so we were able to get everything done much more quickly than expected.

text.text: Meni helped us pick out and installed solar shades for several rooms in our home--including a solar/blackout combination in our bedroom. They look fantastic. He also expedited shipping so we were able to get everything done much more quickly than expected.

originalText.text:
I just completed my second project with Meni. The first was a condo in Manhattan and he did an excellent job with explaining all of the Hunter Douglas shade options during the in-home consultation. His measurements and installation was flawless. Five years later, I still love the shades.

Based on that incredible first experience, I asked Meni to quote window treatments for a large country house (4 times larger than my first project with him). My interior designer received an initial quote from a local (upstate) vendor, but Meni's quote  was much more competitive (not even a close for the exact same Hunter Douglas shades). Similar to the first time, Meni did an incredible job with measuring, ordering, and installation (all in one day for a large house). Importantly, he was neat and tidy, cleaning up all the boxes afterwards. One of the shades arrived defective from Hunter Douglas, so Meni re-ordered it immediately and it arrived within a week.

I can't recommend Meni / Window Horizons enough.

originalText.text: Meni's customer service is absolutely distinctive.  He is responsive, easy to work with and super reliable.  I have no hesitation whatsoever to recommend Window Horizons to anyone!

text.text: Meni's customer service is absolutely distinctive.  He is responsive, easy to work with and super reliable.  I have no hesitation whatsoever to recommend Window Horizons to anyone!

originalText.text: Had a great experience with Meni! He was prompt and professional, and gave really good advice on the types of shades that would best suit each room. He talked me out of one of my original ideas because it would have been way more expensive and not worth it (I'm in a rental apartment) - so he's definitely not trying to sneak in any up-charges. He took very careful measurements, and did a great job on the installation including adjusting for some very not-level pre-war window sills. We couldn't be happier with the end result!

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Window Horizons Corp. Meni was professional, knowledgeable, and attentive to my needs throughout the entire process.
Meni quickly arranged a consultation to assess my space and provide recommendations on the best shades for my living room. He listened carefully to my needs and preferences, and offered several options that would work within my budget.

Once we had decided on the shades, Meni was able to install them efficiently and with minimal disruption to my day. He was friendly and respectful throughout the process, and made sure that I was completely satisfied with the final result.

The shades themselves are absolutely beautiful! They are of high quality and look even better than I had imagined. I have already received several compliments on them from family and friends.
